intro: Calth High Guard (CCLVth COH) follow the Ultramar Doctrine, with an emphasis on large infantry formations. Its armies gain 14 formation points (F/p), 12 upgrade points (U/p), 2 Titan points (T/p), and 6 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Solar Auxilia armies have a Strategy Rating of 2. The highest dice rolled suffers a negative modifier of -1 for each type of ally in the army.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes allied Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Solar Auxilia Tercios have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.

sections.name: Calth High Guard Core Tercios
sections.description: Calth High Guard armies must contain one Section Command Tercio, and at least one Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: 1 Section Command Tercio
formations.units: One Legate Marshal Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squad, and one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns (this upgrade may be taken twice): 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: 1+ Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns (this upgrade may be taken twice): 1 U/p
Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Veletarii Tercio
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Ogryn Tercio
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

sections.name: Calth High Guard Special Tercios
sections.description: May only have one Special Tercio for each Core Tercio

formations.name: Tarantula Automata Tercio
formations.units: Four Tarantula - Lascannon, and/or Tarantula - Hyperios

formations.name: Tarantula Automata Tercio
formations.units: Four Tarantula - Lascannon, and/or Tarantula - Hyperios

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Tercio
formations.units: Three Leman Russ of any single configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leman Russ of the same configuration: 1 U/p

sections.name: Calth High Guard Elite Tercios
sections.description: May only have one Elite Tercio for each two Core Tercios

formations.name: Auxilia Malcador Tercio
formations.units: Two Malcador - Battle Cannon, or two Malcador - Vanquisher, or two Malcador - Lascannon

formations.name: Auxilia Heavy Malcador Tercio
formations.units: Two Malcador Infernus, or two Malcador Valdor Tank Destroyers

formations.name: Auxilia Super Heavy Tank Tercio
formations.units: One Super Heavy Tank of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Super Heavy Tank of the same type: 2 U/p

sections.name: Imperial Navy Squadrons
sections.description: May only have one Navy Squadron for each two Core Tercios

sections.name: Calth High Guard Offboard Support Assets
Collegia Titanica Allied Banners
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Collegia Titanica and Imperial Navy Formations

formations.name: Dire Wolf
formations.units: One Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titan

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries - Melta
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian - Thaumaturgy (1 U/p)
Add Support Legionaries - Plasma, or two Heavy Support Legionaries - Missile Launcher: 2 U/p
Add two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any type: 2 U/p

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Land Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Land Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Attack Speeder Detachment
extraUnits: Add one Attack Speeder - Missile Launcher: 1 U/p

formations.name: Scimitar Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, three Scimitar Jetbikes - Heavy Bolter

formations.name: Outrider Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Outriders - Plasma

formations.name: Contemptor Detachment
formations.units: Four Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any configuration

formations.name: Questoris Lance
formations.units: Two Questoris Knight-Paladins, Crusaders, Errants, Wardens or Gallants. May not mix configurations
extraUnits: Add one Questoris Rocket Pod to the entire formation: 1 U/p

upgrades.title: Steel Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation. No more than three upgrades per Company
